short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser into a mesmerizing display of glowing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Symmetrical patterns that blend vibrant greens, blues, and golden hues. The design evokes a sense of cosmic energy and tranquility, perfect for those who seek a visually dynamic yet soothing browsing experience.

Key features:
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Beautiful background.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
